tags.name: Robo-adviser
tags.description: Robo-adviser is a digital platform that provides automated financial advice based on algorithms.

tags.name: Defi
tags.description: DeFi (Decentralized Finance) refers to blockchain-based financial applications that replicate traditional financial systems, such as lending and trading, in a decentralized and open way.

tags.name: DID
tags.description: DID (Decentralized Identity) is a new approach to identity verification without centralized control.

tags.name: NFT Markets
tags.description: NFT Markets are online platforms where users buy, sell, and trade NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens), unique digital assets representing ownership of specific items or content on the blockchain.

tags.name: Explorer
tags.description: A Blockchain Explorer is a search engine for a blockchain network. It allows users to view transaction history, block details, and network activity, fostering transparency and traceability.

tags.name: Stable Coin
tags.description: Stable Coin is a type of cryptocurrency designed to have a stable value compared to traditional currencies.

tags.name: Cross-chain Bridge
tags.description: A Cross-chain Bridge facilitates the transfer of tokens and data between different blockchain networks, enhancing interoperability and broadening the utility of existing cryptocurrencies and assets.

tags.name: Y Combinator
tags.description: Y Combinator is a renowned startup accelerator fostering entrepreneurial success.

tags.name: Lending
tags.description: Lending is the act of providing funds temporarily with an expectation of repayment, often with interest.

tags.name: Name Service
tags.description: Blockchain Name Service (BNS) is a decentralized naming system on the blockchain. It translates human-readable names into blockchain addresses, simplifying transactions and improving user experience.

tags.name: NFT Collection
tags.description: An NFT Collection is a group of Non-Fungible Tokens, often linked by a common theme or created by the same artist. Each token in the collection represents a unique digital item or artwork.

tags.name: DAO
tags.description: DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) is an organization governed by rules encoded as computer programs on a blockchain.

tags.name: Consumer Finance
tags.description: Consumer Finance is the sector dedicated to personal financial products and services.

tags.name: Commercial Finance
tags.description: Commercial Finance is the provision of loans and financial solutions to businesses.

tags.name: NFT
tags.description: NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) are unique digital assets stored on a blockchain. They represent ownership or proof of authenticity of a specific item or piece of content, from art to virtual real estate.

tags.name: Decentralized VPN
tags.description: Decentralized VPNs are virtual private networks that utilize blockchain technology to distribute network management across multiple nodes, thereby enhancing privacy and security by preventing any single entity from having complete control over users' data.

tags.name: a16z crypto startup school
tags.description: a16z crypto is a venture capital fund that invests in crypto and web3 startups. a16z Crypto Startup School is a twelve-week accelerator program designed around the specific needs of web3 startups.

tags.name: Dex
tags.description: A decentralized exchange (DEX) is a blockchain-based platform allowing direct peer-to-peer cryptocurrency trades, bypassing intermediaries. It leverages smart contracts to automate transactions, ensuring security and privacy.

tags.name: Wallet
tags.description: A blockchain wallet is a digital wallet allowing users to manage, store, and transfer cryptocurrencies securely while interacting with blockchain.

tags.name: Social Fi
tags.description: SocialFi is a fusion of social media and decentralized finance (DeFi). It combines social networking features with DeFi applications, empowering users to earn, trade, and invest digital assets within a social platform.

tags.name: Zero-knowledge
tags.description: Zero-knowledge is a cryptographic method ensuring data privacy without revealing underlying information.

tags.name: Infrastructure
tags.description: Blockchain infrastructure is the tech framework supporting a decentralized digital ledger system. It ensures secure, immutable transactions via nodes, cryptography, consensus mechanisms, and smart contracts.

tags.name: GameFi
tags.description: GameFi, or "gaming finance," combines gaming with decentralized finance (DeFi). It allows players to earn digital assets as rewards, which can be traded or invested, turning gameplay into potential income.

tags.name: NFT Checkout
tags.description: NFT Checkout is the integration of unique digital assets into online purchasing systems.
